name: (dev)Tober Defense
description:
A tower defense lacking in sound design and arts.
You have to survive 20 waves of ennemies with your turrets.
With 21 different turrets : 1 basic
                                                            4 uni elemental
                                                           16 bi elemental

I am not going to lie some are underwhelming other a tad bit overpowered but overall it's a little game made to remind myself and other of old  flash tower defense games that I used to play 15 years ago.
